Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.auxiliary

Class Range

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.auxiliary.Range
public class Range
extends java.lang.Object
auxiliary class that represents a natural numbers range between low and high (including upper and lower bounds)

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(int number)
      checks if the number is or is between the range
      Parameters:
      number - the number that could be in the range
      Returns:
      true if the number is or is between the range

    • isIndexOfCellInRange

      public boolean isIndexOfCellInRange​(int x, int y)
      checks if a given cell indexes are both inside the range or not
      Parameters:
      x - x index of a cell
      y - y index of a cell
      Returns:
      true if the cell x and y indexes are both inside the range
